doc.title: Ayrilik saati
doc.plot: The famous singer Deniz lives happily with her son Ahmet and husband Kenan, who is also her violinist. Kenan gets paralyzed in an accident. He and their friend Necip insist Deniz to carry on with her job. Tarik is employed instead of Kenan. Tarik fancies Deniz. One day, a paparazzi takes their photos. Kenan misunderstands this situation and he expels Deniz from the house. Out of sorrow, Deniz becomes an alcoholic. One day Tarik attempts to abuse her and she shoots him. Tarik goes to Kenan's house and dies after confessing everything to Kenan. Deniz gets arrested. Kenan visits her in the prison, where Deniz shall not be staying for too long. Happy days are close for the couple and their son.
